items.name: utils
items.title: Utils
items.description: Utility functions for Fiber UI components including cn() for class merging and focusRing for accessibility.

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: A button component built with React Aria for accessibility and Tailwind Variants for styling. Includes multiple variants: default, gradient, destructive, outline, secondary, ghost, link, adobe, and instagram.

items.name: switch
items.title: Switch
items.description: An accessible switch/toggle component built with React Aria. Supports disabled states and focus ring for accessibility.

items.name: popover
items.title: Popover
items.description: A popover component with arrow support, header, body, and footer sections. Built with React Aria for accessibility.
